transArray.content: The service is very good and the hotel is relatively clean. Because something happened, I discussed with the front desk to provide a free late check-out, which was considerate.

The night with stars will not be dark, the sea with sky will be blue, the life with dreams will be full of sunshine, and with your days, our work will be more meaningful. Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving us full marks for our service and room hygiene. Your affirmation is the greatest encouragement for our work. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay experience. All hotel staff look forward to it Every time I meet you, I wish you success in your work! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
